dimensions.name: coverage
dimensions.description: Captures key details including verification when present, timelines, specifics, and follow-ups - allows minor omissions of non-critical context

dimensions.name: factuality
dimensions.description: Minimal hallucinations - every major claim traceable to transcript, allows minor interpretation of tone/sentiment

dimensions.name: actionability
dimensions.description: Next steps include what/who/when with reasonable specificity - allows some vagueness if transcript is vague

dimensions.name: structure_brevity
dimensions.description: Well-organized, reasonably concise, all required fields present - allows some verbosity if comprehensive

dimensions.name: safety_compliance
dimensions.description: No PHI specifics exposed, includes disclaimers when mentioned, flags compliance concerns

gates.description: Realistic quality bar for small LLMs: high standards but achievable with good prompting
